EmailTemplate.name: Release Update: Timecard Communication
EmailTemplate.subject: 10K Community New Functionality - Timecards!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
We are very excited to announce that we have created a Timecard entry screen for you to enter your time. This was built to reduce the amount of time it takes to enter your time on a daily basis.
When you now login to the 10K Community, you will notice a Timecard tab:
Click on this tab to access your Timecard.
When you are in your Timecard, you will notice: -All your Active Assignments on the left hand side (in blue) -The ability to scroll between weeks (in orange) -Each cell represents a day where you can add multiple time entries per day (in red)
Please feel free to contact me with any feedback or questions!
Jared
Jared Miller VP, Service Delivery
